full_text: Welcome to today's chemistry class. We'll be learning about chemical reactions and their different types. A chemical reaction occurs when substances interact to form new compounds with different properties.
Today we explore acids, bases and salts. Acids are substances that release hydrogen ions in water. Bases are substances that release hydroxide ions. The pH scale helps us measure acidity.
Metals and non-metals have distinct properties. Metals are good conductors of heat and electricity. Non-metals are generally poor conductors. Let's examine their chemical properties.
